entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening changing to periods of rain later this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
